title: Danielle Lloyd claims Jamie O'Hara 'battered her with a shoe' and 'strangled' her as they war on Twitter
text:
Celebs Danielle Lloyd claims Jamie O'Hara 'battered her with a shoe' and 'strangled' her as they war on Twitter The former wag, 33, made the shocking claims as the exes raged at each other on social media Share Danielle Lloyd arriving at the National Television Awards 2017 (Photo: PA) Share Get   
Danielle Lloyd has claimed that ex-husband Jamie O'Hara "beat" her with a shoe and "strangled" her in a series of shocking posts on social media. 
Taking to Twitter on Saturday night the 33-year-old model alleged that the footballer, 30, was violent towards her in a series of explosive tweets. 
After a tense week which saw them war over Jamie's access to their three boys, Danielle claimed that her ex had been violent towards her on multiple occasions - something Jamie has vigorously denied. 
Jamie hit back, branding her allegations "lies." Read More Danielle Lloyd has claimed Jamie O'Hara abused her physically (Photo: PA) The model, 33, claims Jamie "beat" her with a shoe and "strangled" her (Photo: Rex Features) 
The former Miss Great Britain made the allegations on social media after seeing a tweet from the footballer referring his access rights. 
“How’s this fair? I get denied access then see on social media that my children ain’t even with the mum, she’s at a spa weekend #standup [sic],” wrote the former Fulham star. 
Only hours earlier Danielle had shared a snap of her and her fiancée, Michael O'Neill, enjoying a spa break on Instagram. Read More Danielle Lloyd showcases her blossoming baby bump in a bikini as she puts Jamie O'Hara drama behind her 
Clearly unimpressed with the comment, she hit back, and the exes began arguing on social media. 
In a series of tweets, she accused him of domestic abuse; alleging that he beat her “with a shoe” during a trip to Las Vegas, and that their son Archie has had to intervene in situations before. 
She tweeted : “Jamie o'hara I battered me in Vegas with a shoe in front of Jodie and strangled me in front of ur dad and Archie [sic]." Read More Danielle Lloyd hits back at Jamie O'Hara in full statement after he claimed she's REFUSING to let him see their sons The explosive claims come after the exes fell out over access to their three boys (Photo: Rex Features) 
She then wrote: "U have domestic violence on ur record and there has been injunctions to stop U coming near me [sic]." 
As the row escalated, Danielle also began to respond to her followers, writing to one user: 
"The boys already know they have witnessed his violence towards me and even Archie has to drag him off me! That's emabarrassing [sic]," 
Jamie responded to Danielle's claims in the salvo of tweets, posting a picture of a typed statement. 
It read: "I will not have my name slandered in this way - my lawyer is dealing with this and I'm not adding fuel to the fire on social media. Jeez next you will be saying I'm a drug dealer danielle like [sic]." 
He captioned the image with the words: "These lies and disgraceful things being said I cannot react too, I only ever want to fight for access to my children because I love them [sic]." 
Mirror Celeb has contacted representatives of both Danielle and Jamie for comment. 
The row comes after Jamie and Danielle fell out when the footballer is alleged to have altered the agreed times and parameters of a day with his boys earlier in the week. Like us on Facebook
